name: Benson
description:
Created for the Lost Relic Games - GAME JAM: Connection

WAKEY WAKEY

Time to fulfill your purpose!
What purpose? Why, to restore the city's power!
Now get out there and show your stuff!

CONTROLS

ActionKeyAltMoveA, DArrow KeysJumpSpace-InteractE-Retract CableR- DEVELOPMENT

     This was a sick-with-Covid jam game for me, so I had plenty of time to spend locked away with nothing to distract me from making the best game I possibly could. Of course, there are still many things I couldn't include. It just wouldn't be a jam game without some cut features!
     Overall, I'm very pleased with what I accomplished aurally, visually, and narratively. It's actually the first game I've made that has what I would consider an ending (two in fact O.o). 
     I hope it's as fun for you to play through as it was for me to make!

KNOWN ISSUES
  • While falling, it is possible to get wedged between two nearby objects.
  • The crane can sometimes be used while not plugged into power.
  • From below, the generator can be obliterated by the crane basket.
  • It might make you sad.

If you find any other bugs, feel free to let us know!
